alert.note: Alert for Brown; Calumet; Door; Outagamie; Winnebago (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 09 at 1:35PM CST until March 10 at 12:00PM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...WINTER STORM TO IMPACT TRAVEL TONIGHT INTO FRIDAY MORNING... .A winter storm will bring an accumulating snowfall to the area tonight into Friday morning. The heaviest snowfall will occur this evening and overnight with the highest totals south of Highway 29. Lake enhancement is expected, bringing locally higher amounts near Lake Michigan before this system exits by early Friday afternoon. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 6 inches. Locally higher amounts are possible. Northeast winds gusting to 20-30 mph at times. * WHERE...Calumet, Winnebago, Brown, Door, and Outagamie Counties. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to Noon CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
